name: PertussisTestsForBordetellaPertussisToxinAntibody
title: Pertussis (Tests for Bordetella pertussis Toxin Antibody)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Bordetella pertussis toxin antibody),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: B. pertussis toxin antibody;  

LOINC search: 'Bordetella pertussis toxin -panel'),(Exclusion Criteria: panel tests)
